subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramírez became the 24th player to hit 500 home runs, connecting in the seventh inning against Chad Bradford to help the Boston Red Sox beat the host Baltimore Orioles.
snippet: Manny Ramírez became the 24th player to hit 500 home runs, connecting in the seventh inning against Chad Bradford to help the Boston Red Sox beat the host Baltimore Orioles.
